# [Interview #838: DragonCon 2012 - AMOL Update Report, Entry #2](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=838#2)

#### Question

Will we see cannons and gateways used in creative ways during the Last Battle?

#### Brandon Sanderson

You will see me playing with gateways.
